bestViewPoint.description: Structured information on a coordinate point.

coordinateSpace._instruction: Add the coordinate space in which this coordinate point exists in.
coordinateSpace.description: Two or three dimensional geometric setting.
coordinateSpace.title: coordinateSpace

coordinates.description: Structured information on a quanitative value.

typeOfUncertainty._instruction: Add the type of uncertainty used for this quantitative value.
typeOfUncertainty.description: Distinct technique used to quanitify the uncertainty of a measurement.
typeOfUncertainty.title: typeOfUncertainty

uncertainty._instruction: Enter the measurement uncertainty of this quantitative value.
uncertainty.description: Quanitative value range defining the uncertainty of a measurement.
uncertainty.title: uncertainty

unit._instruction: Add the unit of measurement of this quantitative value.
unit.description: Determinate quantity adopted as a standard of measurement.
unit.title: unit

value._instruction: Enter the measurement value of this quantitative value.
value.title: value

criteria._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to produce this atlas annotation.
criteria.description: Aspects or standards on which a judgement or decision is based.
criteria.title: criteria

criteriaQualityType._instruction: Add the quality type of the stated criteria used to define this atlas annotation.
criteriaQualityType.description: Distinct class that defines how the judgement or decision was made for a particular criteria.
criteriaQualityType.title: criteriaQualityType

displayColor._instruction: Enter the preferred display color (HEX) for this atlas annotation.
displayColor.title: displayColor

inspiredBy._instruction: Add one or several (source) files that inspired the definition of this atlas annotation.
inspiredBy.title: inspiredBy

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this annotation within the file it is stored in.
internalIdentifier.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
internalIdentifier.title: internalIdentifier

laterality._instruction: Add one or both sides of the body, bilateral organ or bilateral organ part that this atlas annotation is defined in.
laterality.description: Differentiation between a pair of lateral homologous parts of the body.
laterality.title: laterality

lookupLabel._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this atlas annotation that may help you to more easily find it again.
lookupLabel.title: lookupLabel

name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this atlas annotation.
name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
name.title: name

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this atlas annotation.
versionIdentifier.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
versionIdentifier.title: versionIdentifier

versionInnovation._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this atlas annotation.
versionInnovation.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
versionInnovation.title: versionInnovation

visualizedIn._instruction: Add the (source) image file in which this atlas annotation is visualized in.
visualizedIn.description: Reference to an image in which something is visible.
visualizedIn.title: visualizedIn

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.description: Reference to a parent object or legal person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.title: hasParent

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.title: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) pointing to the ontological term matching this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.title: ontologyIdentifier

criteria._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to determine this relation.
criteria.description: Aspects or standards on which a judgement or decision is based.
criteria.title: criteria

inRelationTo._instruction: Add the anatomical entity to which the relation is described.
inRelationTo.title: inRelationTo

qualitativeOverlap.description: Semantic characterization of how much two things occupy the same space.
